  • BRAND

Battery - add energy for yourself! Meet a new energy drink!

Carlsberg Ukraine launched Battery, a new energy drink.

Tabasco originated the launch advertising campaign, was responsible for the design and numerous communication materials. With its exceptional taste and refreshment, Battery provides a light charge for the body and mind, giving strength and inspiration for the things that matter.
